p: All studied traits except the proportion of empty flowers per plant were modelled by following the description above. For modelling the proportion of empty flowers of B. acetabulosa, we followed a similar protocol, but used generalized linear mixed models (GLMM) with a negative binomial error distribution to account for the different distribution in the data. We also tested for the need to use zero-inflated models, but models with no zero-inflation parameter had a better fit (lower AIC values).
